channel.title: Clipping combat [PI]
channel.description:
So Im trying to add combat clipping to my PI server, its an oldschool PI. I've put a lot of work into this server so getting a new base isn't the option i'm looking for. I've searched google but found nothing except old help threads that people have requested money for, I added clipped following and it worked perfectly but players can still no clip through walls with attacking an npc.
If anyone knows a tutorial on this, or how to add it, it would be greatly appreciated. Or even help me understand how to add it, cause at the moment I'm not sure.

item.title: Clipping combat [PI]
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“Damoiscool, post:3, topic:545665”][quote author=RandQm link=topic=664547.msg4442566#msg4442566 date=1407289809]

So Im trying to add combat clipping to my PI server, its an oldschool PI. I’ve put a lot of work into this server so getting a new base isn’t the option i’m looking for. I’ve searched google but found nothing except old help threads that people have requested money for, I added clipped following and it worked perfectly but players can still no clip through walls with attacking an npc.

If anyone knows a tutorial on this, or how to add it, it would be greatly appreciated. Or even help me understand how to add it, cause at the moment I’m not sure.

This belongs in server help as you’re looking for server sided clipping.
There’s a great tutorial in the tutorials section by ‘asshole’ which most server use nowadays since it’s pretty decent.
[/quote]

Ah i see I wasn’t sure whether to put in Server or Client. But thanks I’ll see if i can find it.
followed this guide and now following is clipped, but can’t seem to incorporate combat into it.

If you’re talking about using this guide the links are dead…
https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,527173[/quote]
Why does No one read the comments…
https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,527173.msg4393705.html#msg4393705
I’ve already posted a new link. asshole can’t edit his post to change the links (even if he wanted to) because the forum software disables it after like 15 days.

Read full topic

If anyone knows a tutorial on this, or how to add it, it would be greatly appreciated. Or even help me understand how to add it, cause at the moment I’m not sure.
[/quote]

There’s a great tutorial in the tutorials section by ‘asshole’ which most server use nowadays since it’s pretty decent.[/quote]

Ah i see I wasn’t sure whether to put in Server or Client. But thanks I’ll see if i can find it.

If you’re talking about using this guide the links are dead…
https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,527173
